name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Linking Health News to Medical Literature

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-click medical literature search as you read health news articles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
News2PubMed is a Chrome browser extension that can help users fact check health news by pointing them to the original PubMed research paper when they browse health-related news articles. 

Currently we only support:  EurekAlert.org. 

To facilitate users to play with the extension, we provide a page at
https://junwang4.github.io/demo-news2pubmed. There a user can play with a list of news items that are randomly sampled from EurekAlert.org.

News2PubMed is developed by the @LANTIS Lab at Syracuse University. (https://atlantis.ischool.syr.edu/)
